"Welcome back!<br>I was thinking while I:
"Instead of running away all the time, I should
try and stand my ground. You know, smack those
hostiles down hard! I bet I could do it!"

"But you're still definitely the big cheese here!
Thanks for another great lesson!"

"おかえり！
待ってる間、考えてたんだけど……"

"逃げるより、ズザッと踏み込んで
ドンとカマせば、意外とイケるんだな。
そうとわかればオレもヤルぜ！"

"やっぱおたくは最高だよ！
ありがとな！"
